content: this pattern is very forgiving and allows for a lot of creativity once you understand the formula these little kitties usually end up about the size of a jumbo egg and can be a quick satisfying project they re a great project for remnants of yarn left over from making hats and are popular with kids cat lovers and even cats themselves this is my first published pattern and i hope you will get as much enjoyment out of it as my family has you will need yarn hook tapestry needle fiber fill and safety eyes for this project
